# GitHub Actions Workflows

This directory contains GitHub Actions workflows for CI/CD (if implemented in the future).

## Potential Workflows

### R Package Testing
- Run R scripts on different R versions
- Check for package dependencies
- Validate code syntax

### Documentation
- Build documentation
- Check for broken links
- Validate Markdown syntax

### Code Quality
- Lint R code
- Check code style
- Run basic tests

Note: Workflows are not currently implemented but can be added as needed.
